title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully login using valid credentials and are redirected according to their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to /admin page if super admin, or /dashboard for other roles.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and a descriptive error message about invalid credentials is shown.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify users can successfully request and complete password reset procedure.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page.
Enter registered email and submit reset request.
Verify system sends password reset email.
Open the password reset link received via email.
Enter new valid password and submit.
Verify password is successfully reset and user can login with new password.

title: Session Persistence After Page Reload
description: Verify that user session persists after page reload and tokens are securely maintained.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Reload the browser page.
Verify the user remains logged in without requiring reauthentication.

title: Logout Terminates Session
description: Verify that logout properly clears session and redirects the user to the login page.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Click the logout button.
Verify session is cleared and user is redirected to the login screen.

title: Role-Based Access Control: Super Admin Full Access
description: Verify super admin user has full access to all modules including admin dashboard and settings.

steps.description: Login as super admin user.
Navigate through admin modules: organizations, users, licenses, edge servers, AI modules, system settings.
Verify access is granted and functionality is available for all administrative features.

title: Role-Based Access Control: Restricted Access for Regular Users
description: Verify that regular users cannot access super admin or unauthorized areas and receive proper error messages.

steps.description: Login as a regular user (non-super admin).
Attempt to access /admin routes and other restricted pages.
Verify access is denied and user is presented with an unauthorized access error message.

title: Navigation Sidebar Visibility Based on User Role
description: Verify sidebar menu items and navigation options are displayed correctly according to user role permissions.

steps.description: Login as different user roles: viewer, admin, super admin.
Verify only permitted menu items are visible and accessible for each role.

title: Dashboard Widgets Display Real-Time Data
description: Verify that dashboard widgets show real-time statistics, charts, and data summaries properly and update dynamically.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify all widgets load real-time statistics and update as data changes.

title: Camera Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify create, read, update and delete operations for cameras function correctly, including live view and snapshot features.

steps.description: Navigate to Cameras management page.
Create a new camera with valid input data.
Verify the camera appears in the list with correct details.
Update camera details.
Verify the camera details update accordingly.
Access live view of selected camera.
Verify live video stream loads and snapshots can be taken.
Delete the camera.
Verify the camera is removed from the list.

title: Alerts System Functionality
description: Verify alert creation, filtering, status updates, real-time notifications, and export features function correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Alerts page.
Filter alerts using multiple parameters (date, status, type).
Verify filtered alerts match criteria.
Update alert status (acknowledge, resolve).
Verify alert status changes reflected immediately.
Trigger conditions that generate real-time alerts and verify notifications appear.
Export alert data to CSV or Excel.
Verify exported file contains correct alert data.

title: Analytics Dashboards and Report Generation
description: Verify analytics pages show detailed insights, charts, trends, and support report export.

steps.description: Navigate to Analytics and Advanced Analytics pages.
Verify charts, visitor data, and trends load with correct data.
Generate reports for specified date ranges and filters.
Verify reports are generated and export options function correctly.

title: People and Vehicle Management including Recognition Features
description: Verify CRUD operations for people and vehicles, including face and plate recognition and category assignments.

steps.description: Navigate to People management page.
Add a new person with face encoding and assign category.
Verify person appears with correct data and face recognition functionality.
Navigate to Vehicles management page.
Add a new vehicle with plate recognition.
Verify vehicle appears correctly and plate recognition works.

title: Attendance Tracking Check-in and Report Filtering
description: Verify attendance check-in/check-out works and attendance records can be filtered and reported accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to Attendance page.
Perform check-in and check-out actions.
Verify attendance records update accordingly.
Apply date filters to attendance records.
Verify filtered attendance reports reflect correct data.

title: Market Module Event Management and Risk Analysis
description: Verify event creation, filtering, risk dashboards and analysis function as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to Market page.
Create new market event with required details.
Verify event is listed and visible in risk dashboards.
Apply filters to events and risk data.
Verify filtered data matches user criteria.

title: Automation Rules Creation, Editing and Execution
description: Verify AI automation rules can be created, edited, triggered, and logged properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Automation Rules page.
Create new automation rule with triggers and actions.
Verify rule is saved and active.
Trigger conditions that execute the automation rule.
Verify associated actions occur and execution is logged.
Edit existing automation rule.
Verify updates are saved and reflected.

title: Team and Organization Management Operations
description: Verify creation, modification, role assignment, and deletion of users and organizations work correctly with subscription management.

steps.description: Navigate to Team and Organization management pages.
Create new organization and assign subscription plans.
Verify organization is created with correct plan.
Add users to organization with assigned roles.
Verify users have correct permissions based on role.
Modify organization and user details.
Verify changes are saved and reflected.
Delete users and organizations.
Verify entities are removed from the system.

title: Admin Console Management Features
description: Verify super admin functions including monitoring, backups, licensing, system updates, SMS settings, and notifications work correctly.

steps.description: Login as super admin.
Perform organization, user, license, and edge server management operations.
Verify operations succeed with expected results.
Initiate system backup and verify backup status.
Verify backup completes successfully and is listed.
Apply system updates and configure notification settings.
Verify updates are applied and notifications behave as configured.
Configure SMS provider and quotas.
Verify SMS sending respects quotas and provider settings.

title: Unauthorized Access and Invalid Route Error Handling
description: Verify that unauthorized access and invalid URL routes show user-friendly error pages or messages.

steps.description: Attempt to access restricted pages without logging in.
Verify redirection to login page or showing appropriate error.
Login with role that does not have permission for certain pages and try to access them.
Verify an unauthorized access error message or page is shown.
Navigate to invalid or non-existent routes.
Verify a 404 or not found page is displayed.

title: Network Failure and API Error Handling
description: Simulate network failures or API errors and verify the system gracefully handles errors and shows appropriate messages.

steps.description: Disable network connectivity or mock API returning errors.
Perform key operations like login, data fetch, and save.
Verify user-friendly error messages are shown and UI remains stable.

title: Platform Branding and Wording Customization
description: Verify that branding colors, logos, themes, and platform wording customizations reflect immediately across the UI.

steps.description: Login as super admin and navigate to Platform Branding and Wordings settings.
Change branding colors, logos, and theme settings.
Verify UI updates immediately to reflect branding changes.
Update platform wording text.
Verify text changes appear in all relevant UI components.

title: Real-Time Toast Notifications Display
description: Verify global toast notifications display success, error, and informational messages consistently across the platform.

steps.description: Trigger actions resulting in success, error, and info notifications.
Verify correct toast notifications appear with appropriate message, style, and auto-dismiss behavior.

title: AI Modules Configuration and Model Training
description: Verify AI modules can be configured, models can be trained and managed through the AI modules admin interfaces.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Modules Admin and Model Training pages.
Create and configure AI modules.
Verify module settings are saved correctly.
Start training new AI model.
Verify training process initiates, shows progress, and completes successfully.

title: System Monitor and Health Check Interface
description: Verify system health and monitoring pages display accurate real-time status and statistics.

steps.description: Login as super admin and navigate to System Monitor page.
Verify system health data, status metrics, logs, and alerts are displayed and update in real time.
